title: Cigarette makers shifted stance on nicotine patches, gum, study shows

title_detail.value: Cigarette makers shifted stance on nicotine patches, gum, study shows

summary: Tobacco companies have known for decades that, without counseling, NRT hardly ever works, and that consumers often use it to complement smoking. This insight from the formerly secret industry documents, outlines a new report.

summary_detail.value: Tobacco companies have known for decades that, without counseling, NRT hardly ever works, and that consumers often use it to complement smoking. This insight from the formerly secret industry documents, outlines a new report.
